_sText:
CREDITS FOR: Map "de_summersethotel_beta"

Mapping: Heru Pembala

Textures---------------------------
Components--------------------------
And Everything Else Not From Me------ Valve

Prefabs are from:
Robin
code 7492
orbital Studios
and
Seth

There are enough spawns for 20 on each team, bomb should be planted on the third floor of the hotel...

Without these guys who make prefabs, couldn't make the map this good without them 
thanks guys!

This is only my Second map started from scratch, and its still in the beta form and VERY empty...
I will be working on it more and more as the days go by and hopefully release a final version.
I'm still VERY new to mapping and im playing around with light a bit.. so tell me what you think...

Glitches in the map still:
The lights will flicker if only one is shot out...
The glass on the roof is see through, but the texture is weird...
the map has a few map openings that I am having trouble closing such as the:
2nd-3rd floor stairs, under the second floor railing.. .things like that...
the 2nd floor door is weird and is also bugged...

PLANS:
I will later fix all of these bugs, add more props and begin using different types of lighting to get the expressions wanted.
